interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films Collection: Comedy (Arsenic and Old Lace / A Night at the Opera / The Long Long Trailer / Father of the Bride 1950)
Review Date: 2012/06/11
Store: Cary Grant  (Actor),     Marx Brothers  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Spotlight Deals, Mother's Day Gift Ideas in Movies & TV
Product Description: ['TCM Greatest Classic Films: Comedy (4FE) (DVD)', 'ARSENIC AND OLD LACE Cary Grant and a stellar cast romp through this classic farce based on the Broadway hit and breezily directed by Frank Capra. A frazzled drama critic’s two maiden aunts put a secret ingredient in their elderberry wine – and the resulting circus is howlingly hilarious, with a comically rubber-faced, rubber-legged Grant in the center ring. A NIGHT AT THE OPERA Grand opera equals grand comedy as the Marx Brothers cram a ship’s stateroom and more with wall-to-wall gags, one-liners, musical riffs and two hard-boiled eggs – all while skewering pompous schemes to sabotage an opera production. “Arguably their finest film” (4 Star Rating! - Leonard Maltin’s Movie Guide). THE LONG, LONG TRAILER Anyone know how to park this thing? Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz play newlyweds who hit the honeymoon road with a 40-foot house trailer in tow in this slaphappily-ever-after comedy directed by Vincente Minnelli. FATHER OF THE BRIDE (1950) Spencer Tracy is the father and Elizabeth Taylor the bride in this comic celebration of an American rite (and wrongs) of passage. Here comes the bride, there goes dad’s wallet…and everyone’s heart. What sparkling fun!', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Classics, Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, Black & White, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Spencer Tracy, Marx Brothers, Cary Grant, Desi Arnaz, Elizabeth Taylor, Lucille Ball', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 1.0), Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Runtime': '6 hours and 46 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '400649', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, Black & White, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Run time': '6 hours and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 3, 2009', 'Actors': 'Cary Grant, Marx Brothers, Lucille Ball, Desi Arnaz, Spencer Tracy', 'Subtitles': 'English, French', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: It's nice to be able to get a copy of these oldies but goodies. They just don't make them like they used to.
Review Title: Great old movies
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
The Dame Edna Experience - The Complete Collection (Series 1/2 & Specials)
Barry Humphries  (Actor),     Emily Perry  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, BBC, All BBC Titles
['Ten hours of outright hilarity make up this 5-disc Ednathon,', 'The Dame Edna Experience: The Complete Collection', ". Every program from Dame Edna's hysterical and historical series plus over 4 hours of side-splitting extras make this collection a must-have for Edna's legion of die-hard fans!"]
{'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Robin Houston, Charlton Heston, Barry Humphries, Jeffrey Archer, Emily Perry', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '5', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.7 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '10 hours and 4 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 5, 2004', 'Actors': 'Barry Humphries, Emily Perry, Robin Houston, Jeffrey Archer, Charlton Heston', 'Studio': 'BBC Worldwide', 'Number of discs': '5'}
I saw her/him on Graham Norton a while ago. They did a repeat show and I just had to have more. Dame Edna reminds me of the humor we had years ago. She is so quick and witty. You won't be disappointed to get these collections - they are gold....
WONDERFULLY HYSTERICAL !!!!!
1408 (Two-Disc Collector's Edition)
John Cusack  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Horror
['(Thriller) Based on a short story by Stephen King, a man who specializes in debunking the paranormal checks into the infamous room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel, only to discover\x85 the terror is real.']
{'Genre': 'Thriller', 'Format': "Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Collector's Edition, Widescreen", 'Contributor': 'John Cusack', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Media Format': "Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Collector's Edition, Widescreen", 'Run time': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 2, 2007', 'Actors': 'John Cusack', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
What's not to like??? Another great Stephen King movie with great actors like John Cusack and Samuel L Jackson. Stephen's movies are always so fascinating, his plots rarely cease to amaze me. Always something different, he thinks outside of the box.
LUV IT.....

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user has a strong affinity for classic comedy and appreciates the wit of performances, indicating a deep appreciation for vintage cinematic humor alongside well-crafted thrillers, highlighting an expansive taste in storytelling.
- **Content Preference:** Enjoys collecting episodic series and box sets, particularly valuing collector's editions that enhance the viewing experience—reflecting a love for extensive, quality content.
- **Nostalgia Factor:** Finds joy in humor and narratives that evoke memories of traditional comedic styles and significant cultural moments, showcasing a fondness for classic storylines.
- **Engagement with Media:** Actively engages with media formats, particularly DVDs and collector’s editions, indicating a preference for physical collections that offer rich content, as seen in recent purchases.
- **Rating Behavior:** Consistently provides high ratings for content that meets emotional and entertainment needs, with a noted increase in appreciation for intricate plots and performances, especially in non-comedic genres.
- **Influences:** Influenced by performances on talk shows and the craftsmanship of actors, emphasizing a broad interest in the art of acting across various genres.
- **Community Connection:** Likely appreciates communities of like-minded fans, reiterated by being a passionate supporter of diverse genres and classic films, often expressing nostalgia for the golden age of cinema.

Overall, the user values quality comedic content and engaging narratives, frequently seeking comprehensive collections that showcase beloved performers.
